column4: im looking to do a clean install of ubuntu 9.04 from a partition on my hdd. any1 got any ideas on how to do that?
make a brand new partition table
i was going to make a new partition with gparted to put it on, but everything is grey and i cant click anything...
yes, it does.. but i upgraded from 8.04 and somehow im stuck with 24
bad sources list probably,could you paste them?
yes, but they wont start correctly
the screen goes blank for about 5 minutes and then i dont get any wifi :P
start correctly?? just reinstall them and update
when i press esc in grub and select them that is what happens
im afraid ill have to reinstall :/ but i cant do that for another week
you could try re-installing the headers,maybe itll help
